com.att.research.xacmlatt.pdp.policy

Class FunctionDefinitionFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.att.research.xacmlatt.pdp.policy.FunctionDefinitionFactory
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CustomFunctionDefinitionFactory, StdFunctionDefinitionFactory

    public abstract class FunctionDefinitionFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    FunctionDefinitionFactory is an abstract class for mapping function Identifier ids to FunctionDefinition objects.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.3 $
    Author:
    car

      • getFunctionDefinition

        public abstract FunctionDefinition getFunctionDefinition(Identifier functionId)
        Maps the given Identifier representing a XACML function to a FunctionDefinition object.
        Parameters:
        functionId - the Identifier of the FunctionDefinition to retrieve
        Returns:
        the FunctionDefinition for the given Identifier or null if not found
